mapper.select: SELECT MOVI_ID FROM SHOWSCHEDULE WHERE SHOW_DATE = #{today}
SELECT SALE_DATE, MOVI_SALES, PROD_SALES, TOTA_SALES FROM SALES WHERE SALE_DATE = #{yesterday}
mapper.update: UPDATE SALES SET TOTA_SALES = MOVI_SALES + SALES.PROD_SALES WHERE SALE_DATE = #{yesterday}
UPDATE USERS SET USER_TYPE_CODE = #{user_type_code} WHERE ACCU_POINT >= #{accu_point}
mapper.select: SELECT B.USER_ID, B.ACCU_POINT, B.USER_TYPE_CODE FROM ( SELECT /*+index_desc(IDX_USERTYPERECORD_PK)*/ ROWNUM AS RNUM, A.USER_ID, A.ACCU_POINT, A.USER_TYPE_CODE FROM ( SELECT USER_ID, ACCU_POINT, USER_TYPE_CODE FROM USERS WHERE ACCU_POINT IS NOT NULL order by USER_ID ) A WHERE ROWNUM <= #{page}*#{amount}) B WHERE B.RNUM > (#{page}-1)*#{amount}
SELECT UR.USER_ID, UR.UPDA_DATETIME, UR.ACCU_POINT, C.CODE_NAME AS USER_TYPE FROM USERTYPERECORD UR INNER JOIN CODE C ON UR.USER_TYPE_CODE = C.CODE_ID WHERE USER_ID = #{user_id}
